title: Bodoni-ish italic typeface
content:
It has the bubbleish illustration layed in the type on this applicantion. I dont even need that. just the reference font. THANKS

[http://designspiration.net/image/16059202744/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020052514/http:/designspiration.net/image/16059202744/ "http://designspiration.net/image/16059202744/")
author: cjohndesign

comments.content: [Bodoni Poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020052514/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Bodoni+poster) Italic should do the job for me.
